title: VERBATIM: Trump slams NAFTA at autos meeting
text:
VERBATIM: Trump slams NAFTA at autos meeting 6:27am EDT - 01:02
U.S. President Donald Trump met with senior leaders of major U.S. and foreign automakers at the White House on Friday, and discussed planned fuel efficiency rule changes through 2026. He also commented on making changes to the North American Free Trade Agreement. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
U.S. President Donald Trump met with senior leaders of major U.S. and foreign automakers at the White House on Friday, and discussed planned fuel efficiency rule changes through 2026. He also commented on making changes to the North American Free Trade Agreement.
